html:
May 12 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - FY REPORTED REVENUE GREW BY 14.2% TO $3,908M, WITH Q4'21 REPORTED REVENUE GROWTH OF 15.4%.

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - FY UNDERLYING EBITDA WAS $1,792M, UP 18.3% IN REPORTED CURRENCY, AND GROWING 25.2% IN CONSTANT CURRENCY.

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - BOARD HAS RECOMMENDED A FINAL DIVIDEND OF 2.5 CENTS PER SHARE, MAKING TOTAL DIVIDEND FOR FY21 4.0 CENTS PER SHARE.

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AAF.L
